TopicTitle: Community TeamSpeak3 Server - In space, WE can hear you scream!

Articles.Content: Ah, the closest thing to KSP multiplayer yet! Awesome. I will try this later tonight. Canadian here btw.
I want to try but might be to young. Only 12 and 3 quarters.

Yeah, I think I'll pass on joining in on this. I'm a bit too young.
I want to try but might be to young. Only 12 and 3 quarters.

I've played games on voice comms since I was about ten (I'm twenty now), and I found that attitude and personality are a lot more important than voice. If you can be chill and keep the shouting/screaming to a minimum, you'll fit in just fineÃ¢â‚¬â€and that goes for older folks, too. There's occasionally some foul language, but everyone's very nice.

Getting online now. Just need to find a hotkey for push to talk.
This is a great idea. I'm headed to bed right now, but I'll probably see if I can jump on tomorrow night for a bit.
Yeah im really, really calm. (Im not being sarcastic)
I've posted some guidelines on the front page. Nothing too extreme. I'm a laid-back administrator, but I do try to keep things from getting out of hand.
